start: What's the date and time of the big event?
input.date-time:date-time: Please, specify the minimum age of the kids (in years).
input.date-time:incorrect-date-time: You should specify a date and time in the future, not the past.
input.age:min-age: What's the maximum age of the kids (in years)?
input.age:incorrect-min-age: You should specify a valid age.
input.age:incorrect-max-age: Maximum age should not be less than minimum age.
